work.name: Frontline Education
highlights: Interim Team Lead beginning April 2022 facilitating product and development team communication as well as supporting developers in their day-to-day tasks
Designed and implemented an HR Budget React application using react-table and react-query to display numerous tables to display HR data
Designed and implemented a React mapping application that communicated with the google maps api to display student demographics on a map
Erased tech debt on a plotly charting application that displays charts and graphs of student data
Wrote Cypress tests for end-to-end testing
Migrated existing functionless code from ExtJS to React

work.name: Forecast5 Analytics (acquired by Frontline Education)
highlights: Started learning React to combine the GuideK12 mapping tool and the Forecast5 ExtJS mapping tool into a new React-based product

work.name: GuideK12 (acquired by Forecast5 Analytics)
highlights: Designed and implemented a new Python/JavaScript trend analysis tool that used past student trends to predict demographics in the future.

work.name: Excensus (acquired by GuideK12)
highlights: Implemented Python/JavaScript application for parents to find out their child's enrolled school just by entering their address, including charter schools, private schools, etc
Implemented a mapping tool that used Python/JavaScript and the google maps API to map student demographics filtered on almost any criteria
Implemented a boundary planning tool for districts to make future enhancments to their school boundaries based off of the mapping tool mentioned above
